products.manufacturer: Isuzu Technical Center of America, Inc.

summary: AT LAST INSPECTION, I WAS TOLD BY MY MECHANIC THAT THERE IS A LOT OF REAR FRAME RUST ON MY VEHICLE, AND IT MAY NOT BE SAFE TO DRIVE AS THE RUST PROGRESSES.  THERE WAS A RECALL ON THESE VEHICLES, BUT I NEVER RECEIVED A NOTICE.  I BOUGHT MY 2002 ISUZU IN SEPT. OF 2012.  I'M AFRAID TO DRIVE MY VEHICLE, AND I WOULD NEVER SELL IT IN THE CONDITION IT IS, I BELIEVE ITS NOT SAFE.  I NEED A REMEDY.
